channel.title: How do i post a video?
channel.description:
how do i post a vid?then when you click play,the video starts,i wanna post a vid i made on youtube about my server.
~greg [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] The Server Development/Help section is strictly for the server, this means no discussion about the client, trouble with compiling in general, and anything other than the development of servers and otherwise.[/center]

item.title: How do i post a video?
item.dc:creator: @the_predi the predi
item.description:
@the_predi wrote:

go to photobucket.com register over there and put upload your vid over there, when u do that copie the url link and u can put your vid everywhere !!

Hope i helped u

Read full topic
item.source: How do i post a video?

item.title: How do i post a video?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

well as an amature video make download a simple capture…such as hypercam 2.then make sure you have windows movie maker.dont try and be fancy and use vegas editor with a camtasia capture.
vid w/e u want…then file>import into collection
find it, then drag it to the bar at the bottom.do all ure editing crap then save, then file>save as movie file> then go thru the steps
go to youtube, upload, type info…DO NOT PUT THE WORDS “MOPARSCAPE” on or it will BAN you.

then upload the MOVIE file, make sure its the smaller one.

Read full topic
